OpenClinica Enterprise


5.2 Administer Subjects Help

This section allows you to view all the subjects that are available to you. All subjects are ordered through their Person ID. You can choose to reorder the list of subjects by toggling the ascending or descending arrow located next to the Global Unique ID header. Similarly, you can also reorder the subject list using the subject’s Protocol-Subject IDs, Gender, Date Created, Owner, Date Updated, Last Updated By, or Status, and toggle their respective ascending or descending arrows.

1. Find

The Find function, located at the top of the user list, allows you to search for a subject based on the Global Unique ID.

2. Protocol-SubjectIDs

This cell indicates the protocol-subject ID of each subject.

3. Gender

This cell indicates the gender of each subject.

4. Date Created

This cell indicates the date the subject was created.

5. Owner

This cell indicates the owner who originally created the subject.

6. Date Updated

This cell indicates the date the subject was last updated.

7. Last Updated By

This cell indicates the user who last updated the subject.

8. Status

This cell indicates the status of each subject.

9. Actions View (Magnifying Glass Icon)

Clicking on the View button will allow you to see all the details associated with the particular subject.

Edit (Pencil Icon)

Clicking on the Edit button will allow you to edit the subject’s Global Unique ID, Gender, Date of Birth, Father, and Mother.

Remove (X Icon)

Clicking on the Remove button will allow you to remove the particular subject. From this point on, only the Administrator can access and reverse this change if necessary.

Restore (Circular Arrow Icon)

Clicking on the Restore button will allow you to restore the particular subject. From this point on, the subject will be available for studies, unless the subject is removed.
